title: Independent Truck Company
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081029024316im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/indy_4244.jpeg)

This typeface been used by the Independent Truck Company since at least 1978.

I always figured it was hand-done because I had only seen it used in their logo, but I just noticed it in use on some of their packaging as well, which led me to believe it’s a typeface.

I’ve only seen it used in all-caps.

Any ideas?

 [‹ ID font please - Andy Warhol Portraits #1](http://web.archive.org/web/20081029024316/http:/www.typophile.com/node/49836 "Go to previous forum topic") [Need help ID'ing san serif unicase font ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081029024316/http:/www.typophile.com/node/49812 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Nick Sherman
